results.title: Major Book Industry News for January & February 2025 - ISBNDB Blog
results.content: The February 26th meeting of the American Bookseller Association (ABA) demonstrated a mix of enthusiasm and dedication to the industry's future.

results.title: January/February 2025 - Christianity Today
results.content:
This first issue of 2025 exemplifies how reading creates community, grows empathy, gives words to the unnamable, and reminds us that our identities and relationships proceed from the Word of God and the Word made flesh. In this issue, you’ll read about the importance of a book club from Russell Moore and a meditation on the bookends of a life by Jen Wilkin. Mark Meynell writes about the present-day impact of a C. S. Lewis sermon in Ukraine, and Emily Belz reports on how churches care for [...] Published Time: 2025-01-08T11:00:00Z

results.title: Assessing the Global Climate in February 2025 | News
results.content: Assessing the Global Climate in February 2025 | News | National Centers for Environmental Information (NCEI) Assessing the Global Climate in February 2025 Assessing the Global Climate in February 2025 Above-average temperatures over most areas; lowest global and Arctic sea ice extent Global and Arctic sea ice extent ranked lowest on record for February. The February global surface temperature was 2.27°F (1.26°C) above the 20th-century average of 53.8°F (12.1°C), making it the third-warmest February on record. February temperatures were above average across much of the global land surface, particularly over the Arctic, central Eurasia, southern South America and central Australia. Assessing the Global Climate in February 2025 To provide feedback outside of the scope of this survey, please contact us at ncei.webmaster@noaa.gov.

results.title: Portal:Current events/January 2025 - Wikipedia
results.content:
Five people are killed, several are injured, and at least 330 are arrested due to mishandling of pyrotechnics during New Year's celebrations in Germany. (RNZ) (DW)
A police officer is killed and four other people are injured in a vehicle-ramming attack during a patrol in Nelson, New Zealand. A 32-year-old suspect is arrested. (AP)
FBI agents announce the seizure of over 150 homemade pipe bombs and other explosive devices from a home in Norfolk, Virginia, United States. (AP) [...] Seven people are killed in a mass shooting after a brawl in Cetinje, Montenegro. At least two other people are also killed at another location. The perpetrator is on the run. (CNN)
A Tesla Cybertruck explodes outside the Trump International Hotel Las Vegas in Paradise, Nevada, United States, killing the driver and inflicting minor injuries on seven bystanders. (ABC News) [...] Jump to content

From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia
< Portal:Current events
2025JanuaryFebruaryMarchAprilMayJuneJulyAugustSeptemberOctoberNovemberDecember
January 2025 is the first month of the current common year. The month, which began on a Wednesday, will end on a Friday after 31 days. It is the current month.
Portal:Current events[edit]

results.answer: In January-February 2025, the American Bookseller Association showed industry commitment. Global climate in February was unusually warm, with record low sea ice. Several violent incidents occurred globally, including a Tesla explosion in Nevada.
